name: hyper_cuvoid
description:
controls
=======
push space on keyboard to start
push A on 360 controller to start

keyboard
-------------
wasd -> movement
mouse -> view rotation and height
mouse scroll -> zoom in and out
shift + [w/a/s/d] -> run
space -> jump
esc -> back to menu

360 controller
-------------------
left stick -> movement
right stick -> view rotation and height
left trigger -> zoom out
right trigger -> zoom in
X + left stick -> run
A -> jump
back -> back to menu
